title: Please i have request
body: Good evening. I have a big problem, if u can help me. I need 10 more rp to buy a gift for my best friend birthday ! I m really sad about that 10 rp, if you will can help me, i will really appreciate. Ty a lot.

replies.body:
yeaaa... i also needed 17RP and make a quick drawing and got that rp...
here it is XD
http://imgur.com/gallery/iNsix
Wow, happy birthday. My birthday was jun29th, lol. {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} But no one with me, I played this game for the whole night.
